releaseNotes: - Changes: Screen: KLapse: Workaround to avoid the time delay while switching modes.
- Hotplug: AutoSMP: Added Minimum Boost Frequency and Hotplug Suspend.
- Misc: Updated icons for SmartPack & Gestures page.
- Settings: Prevent banner resize option if screen is landscape to avoid app crashing.
- Misc: Removed a bunch of unused resources from the app.
- build: Updated gradle to latest beta release.
- Miscellaneous changes on FAQ, About and more.
